availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 10 ; 10 Feb - 16 March 1865

body.p:
443
March 15 5
Addison H. Lincoln
Eddyville, Ky
Sir
Yours of the 6th ultimo to Gov Bramlette has been refered to this office for Answer.
It is not deemed advisable at present to increase the number of State troops already in the field. If in the future it is determined to raise more, your claims will receive due attention

Very Respectfully
D W Lindsey
Adjutant Genl of Ky
